text: Extensive JavaScript, JQUERY, and Angular JS development.

description.text: I came onboard when we were still in the MVP stage for our web application. This was a very exciting time that allowed for many opportunities for improvement to help our customers.

I was able to utilized my front end strengths while growing my back end skill sets with ASP.Net. My typical tasks for every sprint consisted of full stack development up to our APIs and back to the views.
Working closely with our Product Owner and Stakeholders, I designed and developed new features focusing on our user's experience, satisfaction, and conversions to payments.

achievements.text: Lead corporate redesign of prapay.com.
Lead redesign of payment process user experience for the United Kingdom prapay.com web application.
Lead User eXperience and User Interface design initiatives for new features.
Standardized developer guidelines for front end coding.
Balsamic wireframing during concept phases
Bootstrap 4 / SASS / jQuery for rapid prototyping and final builds.
Implemented daily team code reviews for guidance and collaberation.
Rapid prototyping of clickable concepts.
User experience audits and enhancements.
ADA accessability and compliancy for (WCAG) 2.0

achievements.text: Lead front end application development utilizing Bootstrap 3, Google Material Design Lite, AngularJS, LESS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON, and Thymeleaf for applications built with Java.

Lead push for content delivery network to serve brand files for CSS and JavaScript for all internal applications.
Lead direction for Restful API services to deliver content to front end.
Lead wire framing mock ups for new applications.
Lead front end initiative to modularize JavaScript files, implement separation of concerns and D.R.Y methodologies.
